review_title: Check pro and cons ( All The Best)
pros: Great working place having seasonal festive celebration with colleagues and inside management. No work pressure. Supporting management. Great for people living in Thane.
cons: Basic salary is median. Can ask for raise after probation depending upon performance.

review_title: Research environment at Department of Biotechnology, National College (Autonomous), Tiruchirappalli
pros: Better working environment. Best facilities. No ego among fellow researchers. Can input and use one's own ideas to attain his/her research goals. Shall get few research ideas from the supervisor.
cons: Faculties focus on management work than helping students. Need to pester the faculty in getting our help in research, leading to delayed progress in research.  Need to depend on researchers/faculties from other colleges/universities to get intellectual help on research ideas and writing research paper.  Least care for slow bloomers.
